headline: SoftBank Said to Have Weighed Potential Takeover of Marvell
summary: The Japanese conglomerate’s billionaire founder, Masayoshi Son, has been studying Marvell as a possible target on and off for years, according to the people.  It’s part of his efforts to bet on hardware that can benefit from the artificial intelligence boom.

headline: QQQ considered best tech ETF, but numbers say otherwise
summary: If you’ve ever considered buying what the market thought was the “best” tech ETF, one usually gets mentioned first more than any other: the Invesco QQQ ETF (QQQ).
